title: #490 Hardcore Punks with Ian Fidance and Jordan Jensen
itunes:title: Hardcore Punks with Ian Fidance and Jordan Jensen
description:
Ian Fidance and Jordan Jensen schooled me on all things Punk, hardcore, Ska, and straightedge. These two are in the punk scene hardcore and truly enjoy the camaraderie that comes with it.

 

For more Ari:

Get tickets to see Ari on the road: https://www.arishaffir.com/tour

Cool merch & more: https://www.arishaffir.com/

 

For more Ian Fidance:

For more Ian Fidance:

https://www.instagram.com/ianimal69/?hl=en 

https://linktr.ee/ianfidance 

 

For more Jordan Jensen: 

https://www.jordanjensencomedy.com/upcoming-shows 

https://www.jordanjensencomedy.com/ 

 

The Music:

Converge- The saddest day

Homicidal- Bad Luck 13

Don't Call Me White- NOFX

The Product is You- Incediary 

 

Thanks to our sponsors! Use code "Ari" at 3Chi.com for 5% off and use code "Ari" at Sheathunderwear.com for 20% off your order.
